tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecasts (
  forecast_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  data_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  data_date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
  schedule_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  irrigation_date DATE,
  duration INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalWeather (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    max_temperature FLOAT,
    min_temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);
